ygData.subject: Re: Hottest selling items$$?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hottest selling items. That depends on what you mean. And typically Tailored backpacks on Drinal sell for 75 to 125 plat. I wouldn t pay more than 85
ygData.messageBody:
Hottest selling items. That depends on what you
mean. <br><br>And typically Tailored backpacks on
Drinal sell for 75 to 125 plat. I wouldn't pay more than
85 plat probably though. I don't even have that
kinda dough after spell shopping though (took me over
225 plat to buy almost all my 39 spells).<br><br>Hot
items are usually things like Fungi Tunics, FBSS, Yaks
and Waks. (although I'm not sure that Waks are really
what ppl call them. I just do).<br><br>For low level
loot. Yep. Bone chips are decent, and so are CB belts.
Used to sell a few and then go in and turn in the rest
of mine for the quest. The exp and the item you get
for that quest more than made up for the run from CB
to Kaladim and back again. Made a lot of low level
plat for spells that way. <br><br>shooman
out<br><br>PS... I wasn't sure what to write here. I just typed in
some general info. Hope it helped or answered the
question. <br><br>Fatehue Prismatic
